translations: 诙谐的；爱开玩笑的；滑稽的；(尤指在不合适的时候)开玩笑的

sentences.sentence: Stop being facetious; this is serious.
sentences.translation: 别乱开玩笑，这是个严肃的事。

sentences.sentence: The woman eyed him coldly. "Don't be facetious," she said.
sentences.translation: 那妇人冷冷地看了他一眼。“别那么轻浮，”她说道。

sentences.sentence: Yet there is also an art history of rubbish (and don't forget, facetious remarks are welcome on this blog).
sentences.translation: 不过废品艺术却早有一段历史(别忘了，在此博客上欢迎戏谑的评论)。
